title: Medi-gel
effect: Repairs organic damage

title: Nano-gel
effect: Repairs mechanical damage

title: Insta-hack
effect: Temporarily gains control over a device

title: Grapple gun
effect: Pulls an object to the gun or the gun to an object

title: Glue grenade
effect: Sticks everything in the zone for 1 round Hindered

title: EMP grenade
effect:
Disables all electronics in the zone for 1 round.
Synthetics receive 2x Injury instead

title: Fragmentation grenade
effect: Deals damage to everything in the zone

title: Gravitational emitter
effect: Attracts/repels everything up to 1 Zone away. Moving against the emitter causes Hindrance

title: Frost grenade
effect: Everyone in the zone is frozen. +2 Frost

title: Air conditioning
effect: +/- Frost/Heat in the zone

title: Scanner
effect: Multipurpose scanner

title: Magnetic gun
effect: Moves metallic objects

title: Multipurpose bow
effect: Shoots objects up to line of sight distance

title: Heat gun
effect: Emits immense heat up to line of sight distance

title: BFG
effect: Huge weapon: absorbs all heat from the zone for 1 round, causes Doom in the next round

title: Thermodynamic blade
effect: A blade that drains heat from enemies and heats up the wielder (+1 Effect, +1 Heat)

title: Holo-generator
effect: Generates holographic images

title: Barrier generator
effect: Creates a barrier between zones that absorbs 3 damage

title: Turret
effect: Deploy a small turret in your Zone. The turret can attack with 1 Effect during your turn. At the end of each turn, discard an Outcome card with Effect 1+ or the Turret shuts down

title: Gambeson
effect: Light fabric armor. Negates 1 Injury from slashing damage.

title: Chainmail
effect: Medium metal armor. Negates 1 Injury from slashing and piercing damage. -1 Effect when sneaking, running, climbing or swimming.

title: Plate Armor
effect: Heavy metal armor. Negates 2 Injuries from slashing and piercing damage and 1 Injury from bludgeoning damage. -2 Effect when sneaking, running, climbing or swimming.

title: Buckler
effect: Light metal shield. +1 Effect when defending from melee attack once per round.

title: Kite Shield
effect: Large wooden shield. +1 Effect when defending from melee or ranged attack. -1 Effect when sneaking, running, climbing or swimming.

title: Dagger
effect: A light one-handed piercing melee weapon. Can be thrown 1 zone away.

title: Hand Axe
effect: A light one-handed slashing melee weapon. Can be thrown 1 zone away.

title: Longsword
effect: A medium one- or two-handed piercing or slashing melee weapon. +1 Effect when slashing when wielded with both hands.

title: Zweihänder
effect: A heavy two-handed slashing melee weapon. +1 Effect when attacking.

title: Greataxe
effect: A heavy two-handed slashing melee weapon. +2 Effect when attacking multiple enemies.

title: War Hammer
effect: A heavy two-handed piercing or bludgeoning melee weapon. +1 Effect against armor.

title: Mace
effect: A medium one-handed bludgeoning melee weapon. 1 Injury negated by armor turns to Distress instead.

title: Morningstar
effect: A medium one-handed bludgeoning melee weapon. Ignores shields.

title: Staff
effect: A light two-handed bludgeoning melee polearm weapon. +1 Effect when tripping an enemy.

title: Spear
effect: A medium two-handed piercing melee polearm weapon. Once per round outside your turn you can attack an enemy entering your zone.

title: Billhook
effect: A heavy two-handed piercing or slashing polearm weapon. +1 Effect against cavalry.

title: Hunting Bow
effect: A light two-handed ranged weapon. Effective Range: 1-2 zones away. -1 Effect when shooting targets in the same zone.

title: Crossbow
effect: A heavy two-handed ranged weapon. Effective Range: 1-2 zones. Ignores Plate Armor. -1 Effect when shooting targets in the same zone.

title: Hand-Cannon
effect: A heavy two-handed ranged weapon. Effective Range: 1-2 zones away. Requires 2 Outcome cards over 2 turns to load and fire. Add Effect of both cards together. -1 Effect when shooting targets in the same zone.

title: Riding Horse
effect: Can move 2 zones per turn. +1 Effect when attacking infantry on horseback.

title: Horse-Drawn Wagon
effect: Can move 2 zones per turn. Capacity: 2 people in the front and up to 6 in the back. +1 Effect when defending from infantry.

title: Grappling Hook and Rope
effect: +1 Effect while climbing.

title: Lockpick Set
effect: Allows picking locks.

title: Bandages
effect: Removes 2x Injury. Usable during battle. Consumed after use.

title: Healing Salve
effect: +1 Effect when healing to remove Injuries. Not usable during battle.

title: Herbal Remedy
effect: Receive a Boost. Usable during battle. Consumed after use.

title: Prayer Book
effect: +1 Effect when practicing religion to relieve Distress. Not usable during battle.

title: Mead
effect: Removes 2x Distress. Usable during battle. Consumed after use.

title: Granade
effect: Play an Outcome card to throw the granade up to 1 zone away. Damages everything in the zone. Consumed after use.

title: Lantern
effect: Provides light in the current zone. Can be used in the rain. Does not count as an open flame.

title: Torch
effect: Provides light in the current zone. Cannot be used in the rain. Counts as an open flame

title: Cannon
effect: A heavy explosive artillery weapon. Effective Range: 2+ zones away. -1 Effect when shooting targets 1 zone away. Cannot target the same zone. Ignores all shields and armor. Damages everything in the zone.
